item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>I hope that the champagne had a positive effect on you cold Matthew. I would certainly recommend it as a remedy! If you don't recover soon I'm sure the Florida sunshine will help (jealous!)</p>
item.content:encoded: I hope that the champagne had a positive effect on you cold Matthew. I would certainly recommend it as a remedy! If you don’t recover soon I’m sure the Florida sunshine will help (jealous!)
